Movie_name: Eurovision Song Contest - The Story of Fire Saga

Review title: Amazing movie! And a new favorite for sure!
Review_body: Maybe I'm out of the norm, but I'm an American who pretty much can't stand Will Ferrell movies because the humor is usually so incredibly stupid. But this movie is amazing! The humor is often goofy, but it's not as over the top as is usual for him. And oh, the feels!!! I laughed my @$$ off in parts and I wiped away tears in others. The cast is wonderful overall, but McAdams and Ferrell had such great chemistry that you can't help but love them as a couple. And the music! I was close to sobbing in my third viewing of the movie during "Hussavarik" because the vocals and the sentiments were so beautiful. I actually watched this one day, kept thinking about showing it to my boyfriend, and sat him down to watch it 24 hours later, and he loved it too. And it was as fun to watch a day later as it was that first time.I cannot recommend this movie enough. It's fun, goofy, and sweet with some clever surprises and fabulous music. And, oh my god, elves! And "Ja Ja Ding Dong" is unforgettable--in a good way. Especially if you like reading lyrics via subtitles.
Movie_name: Eurovision Song Contest - The Story of Fire Saga

Review_body: A light hearted comedy that tugged at the heart strings, I loved the film and everything about it. the music was really good to especially the Husavik song 😍 a great family watch...
Movie_name: Eurovision Song Contest - The Story of Fire Saga

Review_body: A happy couple of hours with a lot of lovely nonsense.
Movie_name: Eurovision Song Contest - The Story of Fire Saga

Review title: The Perfect movie for right now.
Review_body:
After you have spendt the last 3mnth watching every single series and movie on Netflix. We have had our moments. The last Dance. Tiger king. Whatever that Hemsworth movie was called. And now this one.
2hour of forgetting about all the stuff that is happening in the world and allow ourself some fun.This is a good old facion feelgood movie. In short its an american version of Still Crazy but with Eurovision.
It has a thin plot. Bad jokes. Great jokes. Amazing cast. And incredibly catchy songs.Its a 2hour long period of your day. Where you can laugh about the banality of the Eurovision. And still feel inspired.Beeing a Norwegian. When i grew up in the 80's in a small Village . With fishing boats. And the Artic light around us his was one of the biggest tv event of the year. And we all had the same dream as Erik.
And over the years we have seen the contest evolve in to this weirdly glitter fest.
And to be able to capture this on film. Was to me amazing. Its smart while being stupid. Its cute while being crude. And its has self irony.
I give it 10points. Not because its the best movie ever. But because for 2hours it made me smile. Laugh. Akward. And it gave me incredible goosebumps.
And it made me enjoy myself all the way through.
Thank you for making this. I will see it again and again and again
Movie_name: Eurovision Song Contest - The Story of Fire Saga

Review_body: This is probably the worst film I have ever seen in my life. Time I will never EVER get back, don't waste your time.
Movie_name: Eurovision Song Contest - The Story of Fire Saga

Review title: Watched 30mins,wont be going back for more
Review_body: Muck,no laughs whatsoever. Just doesn't capture any attention. I wish I could give it more of a chance because I rate Will Ferrell older movies very highly,but just could not be bothered with this one
Movie_name: Eurovision Song Contest - The Story of Fire Saga

Review_body:
20 oscars goes to...
thank you for making 2020 bearable. didn't even like will ferrell before this.
and thank you ebu and molly sandén!
Movie_name: Eurovision Song Contest - The Story of Fire Saga

Review_body: So bad that the movie is funny. The acting is terrible, the cameos of earlier participants are the worse. And why did Americans make this movie?
Movie_name: Eurovision Song Contest - The Story of Fire Saga

Review title: Forget the critics. This is good
Review_body:
As a family of Eurovision fans, we loved this film. It was funny, heart warming, sad in places and an all round feel good film. If you like Eurovision, you'll love this. Includes cameos from some Eurovision favourites and some catchy music, eurovision style.
Ignore what the critics say and settle in for a couple of hours of good entertainment.
Movie_name: Eurovision Song Contest - The Story of Fire Saga

Review title: As a proud Eurovision lover this film is everything!
Review_body: I love Eurovision! I have no shame about this! Every year we have a get together with drinks and food and scoresheets and have the best night! This year everything changed, there was no get together, no singing our favourite songs, no voting and it was so so so missed!Tonight me and my sister thought let's give this a go, it will be a laugh. Well we were given Eurovision life! It was everything that we love about eurovision! The songs, the cheesiness, the love! Watch the film, enjoy it like a weekend of eurovision and don't take it seriously!The storyline is cute, its not forced it just flows and even if the length of the film feels long to you, you may not be a fan of eurovision (that show is long!!). I didn't want it to end and some of those songs are pure euro classics!! I have to say as a UK native we haven't won in a long long time so the only implausible part of the film is that it is in the UK and the hosts are not British but apart from that I will be watching this film anytime I feel sad as it has made my evening and made up the fact that eurovison was cancelled this year!Enjoy the film and don't take it seriously because Eurovision is just fun and meant to be enjoyed!!
Movie_name: Eurovision Song Contest - The Story of Fire Saga

Review_body: Loved the style. Husavik is going to be my favourite song from now till forever!
Movie_name: Eurovision Song Contest - The Story of Fire Saga

Review_body: The songs hooked me, the actors (and their characters) are adorable, and there's just enough of Will Ferrells humor to make this a regular on my watchlist for rainy, down-in-the-dumps, days. A great feel-good movie.
Movie_name: Eurovision Song Contest - The Story of Fire Saga

Review_body: I had little to no expectations for this movie. It turned out to be one of the best if not the best Will Ferrell movies. The two main characters were great and it's really a perfect feel good comedy. The music was also really good. That last song gave me goosebumps!
Movie_name: Eurovision Song Contest - The Story of Fire Saga

Review_body: Very enjoyable, cried happy and sad tears. Laughed through most of it and loved the song-a-long! The elves bit was cute also. This is one of the better Netflix original movies.
Movie_name: Eurovision Song Contest - The Story of Fire Saga

Review_body:
I felt depressed and wanted to watch something nice, no expectations, no desire for anything "progressive" (although there still was a tiny bit of it, i guess, Netflix can't help it), just a movie. Unfortunately, that's hard to find nowadays and I was glad I came across this movie.
Appreciate the beautiful scenery, it was interesting to see Iceland, very nice songs and some humor. All and all - the movie put me in a good mood and that's all what I wanted.
Movie_name: Eurovision Song Contest - The Story of Fire Saga

Review_body: This film is godlike! Subtle butter on a camping knife. Even Pierce Brosnan acts towards the end. Subtleties emerge with repeated viewing. Watch!
Movie_name: Eurovision Song Contest - The Story of Fire Saga

Review_body:
This movie is exactly what Will says in his words on The EurovisionSong Contest stage..
IT COMES FROM THE HEART...10/10.Couldn't stop watching a great feel good movie....!!!!!
Movie_name: Eurovision Song Contest - The Story of Fire Saga

Review_body: Lots of very European tongue in cheek humour. Great pick you up movie. Definitely worth a watch if you need a good laugh.
Movie_name: Eurovision Song Contest - The Story of Fire Saga

Review_body: It would be extremely difficult not to like this film. Watch it and accept it for what it is and enjoy 2 hours of brilliance. You'll laugh and cry in equal measure.
Movie_name: Eurovision Song Contest - The Story of Fire Saga

Review_body: It's not bad as far as the actors and cinematography goes but the writing failed the movie. It's watchable but not overly enjoyable.
Movie_name: Eurovision Song Contest - The Story of Fire Saga

Review_body: As an European, with Will Ferrell, I was expecting Americans just mocking Europeans and their Eurovision. This movie suprised me, I truly loved it. The songs, the references to Eurovision, the story line, I laughed and cried. They nailed it. I don't know why they choose Iceland, but it was a great tribute to this amazing country and people. Thank you for brightening up this dark year!
Movie_name: Eurovision Song Contest - The Story of Fire Saga

Review_body: Both myself and my husband enjoyed watching this movie and would recommend it to others.
Movie_name: Eurovision Song Contest - The Story of Fire Saga

Review_body: Will Ferrell at his best, ....... probably one of his best productions. A cool story, and so cool to be able to watch a recent release that isn't full of expletives.
Movie_name: Eurovision Song Contest - The Story of Fire Saga

Review_body: I love this movie. The tacky songs, the humor is perfect. As a fan of Eurovision, thank you Will and Rachel! Hope you will be guests on the show next year and the guy who wants to hear jaja dingdong as well ;). PLAY JAJA DINGDONG!!!!!
Movie_name: Eurovision Song Contest - The Story of Fire Saga

Review_body: Wow just wow, as an eurovision fan this so exciting to see. Well deserved 10 out of 10!
Movie_name: Eurovision Song Contest - The Story of Fire Saga

Review_body:
I loved it! Because it hits a high sensible part about home, dreams and meaning of our actions.
And it's hilarious ! Thumbs up Will Ferrell !
Movie_name: Eurovision Song Contest - The Story of Fire Saga

Review_body:
This film really draws you in and ends up surprising you with its heart. It's the ultimate 'feel good' movie!
I love silly humour, and whilst there are a few silly scenes, the film is driven along by the wonderful characters and delightful music.
Rachel McAdams is an absolute delight in this, a shining star in a surprisingly beautiful 2 hours of entertainment. I loved it!
Movie_name: Eurovision Song Contest - The Story of Fire Saga

Review_body: Wow. What a much needed surge of humour! I watched this with my friend and we both absolutely loved it. I thought all of the cast were phenomenal but Rachel McAdams truly shined! A much needed film, especially when we missed out on ESC this year:(! The film had a perfect balance of humour/goofiness and emotional scenes. Bravo to everyone involved. Many of the songs going in my playlist!
Movie_name: Eurovision Song Contest - The Story of Fire Saga

Review_body: Endearing and funny in all the right spots. Just what I needed instead of crap news cycle and doomsday predictions. Will watch again and again #yayadingdong
Movie_name: Eurovision Song Contest - The Story of Fire Saga

Review_body: I had smile on my face for 2 hours. Enough. And I really hated ESC till today. Now I can't wait.
Movie_name: Eurovision Song Contest - The Story of Fire Saga

Review_body: The storyline touched me. the last song.. i came to tears. i moved countries at a young age and the movie was something i could relate to. i felt that the characters were well thought out and presented really well. the movie had a really funny kink to it, it's gave it just what it needed. it had me hooked onto the story from the start - the first time i put my phone down during a movie. it's really ran home for me and by the way that the movie is presented, i only hope others get touched by it too. the actors were stunning. the story was stunning. the music was stunning. the message was stunning.
Movie_name: Eurovision Song Contest - The Story of Fire Saga

Review title: Feel good love story that's fun!!
Review_body: The Sing Along...you can't help but smile during it!!!! Always great to watch something with Will Farrell but it also made me see a different side to Rachel McAdams that I loved.
Movie_name: Eurovision Song Contest - The Story of Fire Saga

Review title: Wow..I truly enjoyed all the songs...Ja ja Ding Dong..jajaja
Review_body:
I watched already like three times..I truly enjoyed...volcano man, Jaja Ding Dong, Husavik, double trouble,Amar pelos dois, song- a-long, etc
fortunately I know about Eurovision contest...it is truly huge in Europe
Movie_name: Eurovision Song Contest - The Story of Fire Saga

Review_body: This film is a pure love letter to all things Eurovision. Great musical/comedy performances. An utter joy to watch!
Movie_name: Eurovision Song Contest - The Story of Fire Saga

Review_body: Americans actors faking Icelandic accents make this very hard to watch for a European. Why would you not just hire Icelandic actors?
Movie_name: Eurovision Song Contest - The Story of Fire Saga

Review_body: I cannot ever get back the time I wasted on watching this waste of purported talent.
Movie_name: Eurovision Song Contest - The Story of Fire Saga

Review_body:
I thoroughly enjoyed the movie. Unlike a lot of Ferrell's movies, it was hilarious because of its subtlety. I personally prefer that kind of humour.
I loved the characters, the relationships and chemistry was believable. A well written and very enjoyable movie with some fantastic music!
Movie_name: Eurovision Song Contest - The Story of Fire Saga

Review_body:
Best Movie in 2020! Was better than i expectet!
Love from Denmark.
Movie_name: Eurovision Song Contest - The Story of Fire Saga

Review_body: I sang, laughed, cried and tapped my feet. What a joy of a movie. Rachel McAdam was adorable and stunning as Sigrid. Will Farrel was funny and loveable as always. I highly recommend.
Movie_name: Eurovision Song Contest - The Story of Fire Saga

Review title: Captures the heart and soul of Eurovision Song Contest.
Review_body: I rarely watch comedies because I often find them silly and immature but to my surprise I found myself laughing from beginning to end.This movie really captures the spirit of Eurovision Song Contest in every way.All actors were great but the standout was Dan Stevens as the Russian contestant.Thank you Will Ferrell for showing Eurovision Song Contest to the world.
Movie_name: Eurovision Song Contest - The Story of Fire Saga

Review_body: Frighteningly realistic. Unfortunately, the American audience without the knowledge of Eurovision does not understand how good a movie this is.
Movie_name: Eurovision Song Contest - The Story of Fire Saga

Review title: The real star was Graham Norton all along.
Review_body: No, really. I don't know if he does actual commentary work for English speaking Eurovision broadcasts, but he absolutely nailed it with his narration of Iceland's performances. It made me miss one of our former commentators, known for his acidic wit and merciless mockery of anything he could point his finger at.The rest of the cast did a decent job too, I guess. After all, Norton's commentary wouldn't have been half as funny without something to comment on.
Movie_name: Eurovision Song Contest - The Story of Fire Saga

Review_body: This is fab! It embodies the cheese of Eurovision in the best way. Hilarious. I'm a massive Eurovision fan and can only imagine that the people making this are too. And there is some fantastic Iceland and Scotland scenery, both of which are stunning.
Movie_name: Eurovision Song Contest - The Story of Fire Saga

Review_body: I've always loved both Will Ferrell and Rachael McAdams ( hope I spelled her name right). I wasn't sure if i was into it at first but Will Ferrell!!!! That's always a yes, so I watched and he delivered, as always, a stellar performance in his usual awkward yet lovable acting style! . Oh and Ingrit was so sweet, so adorable and so full of love and compassion and loyalty to Larrs and to her hometown. I felt like crying and it wasn't what I expected to feel. I was on the edge of my seat, at times, the feelings were overwhelming. The ending, however, was so stunning, so perfect! I don't know how they create these movies. I'm in love with these two actors. As an aside, If Elf had been made with anyone other than Will Ferrell, it wouldn't have had such charm and the child like innocence that made it what it was . I'll leave it with two very enthusiastic thumbs up! Please keep going, Mr. Ferrell, you are a genius!
Movie_name: Eurovision Song Contest - The Story of Fire Saga

Review_body:
I watched the trailer before but I did think this movie could be this crazy....Man
Every time during the movie you fill omg I didn't think that this gonna come up next....
And lead cast.... man.... You gotta kidding me.... Just amazing every bit of a time....
And the songs.... I can't get it out from my system....
I already watched it multiple times....
Movie_name: Eurovision Song Contest - The Story of Fire Saga

Review_body: If you're looking for mindless comedy, this is perfect! Not the funniest film, but if you're looking to lose yourself for 2hrs then you'll love this. Catchy music, silly humour, ridiculous characters, it has it all. Stock your critics head in a bag under the stairs and enjoy!!!
Movie_name: Eurovision Song Contest - The Story of Fire Saga

Review_body: I believed it was a film to just mock Eurovision but instead it was just a fun and really well made film. Both extremely stupid and funny but I've got to say it's a really good film in general, the storyline and cast were brilliant!! Very much recommend, especially to Eurovision fans😊
Movie_name: Eurovision Song Contest - The Story of Fire Saga

Review_body: I am not a Eurovision fan or Will Farrell fan, but this film was so funny, sweet and genuine.Rachel McAdams was beautiful and Will Farrell really loveable and a really original story that is now definitely my new guilty pleasure!Went straight back to the start to rewatch it again.
Movie_name: Eurovision Song Contest - The Story of Fire Saga

Review_body:
This movie is more for europeans. I don't think the americans get all the irony and how europeans reccon the atmosphere around Eurovision Song Contest that takes place every year in Europe.
Movie is just great! They use artist and people from Eurovision. Maybe USA will open their eyes for the Eurovision contest. Many actuall preforming artist is part of the movie :) Just love it!
Movie_name: Eurovision Song Contest - The Story of Fire Saga

Review_body: Absolutely adored it. I'm a major Eurovision fan, and have been watching since Dami Im preformed for Australia in 2016. My family had just learnt to deal with it, but when I forced them all to watch this film for my birthday, they actually liked. There was lots of laughter and awesome music. I would so recommend watching it again and again! (I have already seen it three times!!!!)
Movie_name: Eurovision Song Contest - The Story of Fire Saga

Review_body: If you love the cheesiness of Eurovision then this is perfect for you. The songs are catchy, I defy anyone not to be singing yaya ding-dong afterwards. The story is funny and light. Eurovision isn't about serious musicians for me, its all about dodgy tunes, bad costumes and cheesy songs and I love it!!
Movie_name: Eurovision Song Contest - The Story of Fire Saga

Review title: Unique plot, but wack acting and character
Review_body: The film has a unique plot, nice songs and some really amazing actors/artists. But I didn't quite like the acting and the character of Lars.
Movie_name: Eurovision Song Contest - The Story of Fire Saga

Review title: 2 hours I will never get back!
Review_body: I personally wouldn't waste my time watching this film, we put it on as something to watch as we knew it would be cheesy little did we know how horrific it was going to be!Setting the Eurovision in Edinburgh but pretending to film it in the Hydro in Glasgow and showing it as if it was just at the end of the street was really cringeworthy.Save yourself 2hrs and watch something else. I really don't know how this film is getting the 9-10 stars at all if I could give it -10 I would.
Movie_name: Eurovision Song Contest - The Story of Fire Saga

Review_body: I love that movie.i want to visit Husavik one day.
Movie_name: Eurovision Song Contest - The Story of Fire Saga

Review_body: Eurovision is characterised by its wildness and craziness, which I feel this movie represented extremely well! I admit I was scared to see the interpretation of the contest that this movie would present, but after watching it I was pleasantly surprised how they managed to incorporate the spirit of Eurovision into everything that happened in the film, resulting in a fun, albeit not realistic, representation of a journey to (somewhat) fame.
Movie_name: Eurovision Song Contest - The Story of Fire Saga

Review_body: I didn't expect much from this movie but it was really good. Exciting, funny, sad, romantic and I loved the music. I've already seen the movie twice and will probably watch it again this year 🙂.For me the movie is the same as Fire Saga in Eurovision. Probably wouldn't win any contest but it won my heart 🙂😊
Movie_name: Eurovision Song Contest - The Story of Fire Saga

Review_body:
I was only 5 minutes into the film where I had to rush to my social media accounts and tell people they needed to drop whatever they were doing and going to watch this film. Loved everything about it. One of Ferrell's best comedies, in my opinion, which I will cherish next to Anchorman. Loved the effort put in showcasing some of the nuances of life in Iceland. Ironically, the night before we had started watching "The Valhalla's murders" a Netflix drama detective series, but as it is set in the same city of Húsavík including some of the interior sets, now I can no longer watch it with a straight face.😆
Enjoyed the chemistry between Ferrell and McAdams. And shout out to Croydon-born Dan Stevens whose character Alexander Lemtov gave me some of the biggest laughs and I'm sure it will do for everyone who can read between the lines.Also...my 12 points go to:
Ja Ja Ding Dong
PLAY IIIIIIT!!!!
Movie_name: Eurovision Song Contest - The Story of Fire Saga

Review title: Appreciated by Europeans and Will Ferrell fans alike!
Review_body: My husband is from Europe, and grew up watching the Eurovision song contest. Then, he introduced it to me. This movie TOTALLY captures the spirit and the essence of Eurovision. If you haven't, I highly recommend viewing a few year's worth...and then watching this movie again. You may even spot a few former Eurovision "stars"! I'm a huge Will Ferrell fan...my husband, not so much. He's the reason we're writing this positive review.
Movie_name: Eurovision Song Contest - The Story of Fire Saga

Review_body: You can't watch Eurovision without watching this movie. It's funny and show some of the importans part og the Eurovision.
Movie_name: Eurovision Song Contest - The Story of Fire Saga

Review_body: It was quite touching , owerall it was like blades of glory
Movie_name: Eurovision Song Contest - The Story of Fire Saga
